diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BK$ is $x+2$ units.
The length of the line $BJ$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $LB$ is $x+10$ units.
The length of the line $BM$ is $x+7$ units.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $J$.
Point $B$ also lies on the line connecting $M$ and $K$.
Point $L$ lies on the circle with center $O$ and radius $5$.
Point $M$ lies on the same circle with center $O$ and radius $5$.
Point $K$ lies on the same circle with center $O$ and radius $5$.
Point $J$ lies on the same circle with center $O$ and radius $5$.
line_instances: The lines $LJ$ and $MK$ are the diagonals.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center at point O.
